Translated Question: Constructors dodow ahe na wobetumi ayɛ ama adesuakuw bi?
Translated Desired Answer: Dodow a anohyeto nni mu.
Translated Student Answer: dodow biara a wopɛ, bere tenten a wɔn mu biara wɔ akyinnyegye ahorow a wɔahyehyɛ no soronko no

Translated Question: Kyerɛkyerɛ mpaapaemu ne nkonimdi ho nhwɛso no mu tiawa.
Translated Desired Answer: Kyekyɛ ɔhaw bi mu yɛ no ɔhaw nketewa nketewa, di ho dwuma mpɛn pii, na afei fa ano aduru no bom ma ɛnyɛ ɔhaw a edi kan no ano aduru.
Translated Student Answer: Divide and conquer paradigm no kyekyɛ ɔhaw bi mu nketenkete ne nketewa a ɛnyɛ den sɛ wobedi ho dwuma.

Translated Question: Ne tiawa mu no, ɔkwan bɛn so na nhyehyɛe a wɔpaw no yɛ adwuma?
Translated Desired Answer: Ɛpaw nea esua koraa fi nhyehyɛe bi mu na ɛde si gyinabea a edi kan no so, afei ɛpaw nea esua koraa fi nhyehyɛe no nkae no mu na ɛde si gyinabea a ɛto so abien no so, ne nea ɛkeka ho.
Translated Student Answer: selection sort hwehwɛ data ahyehyɛde a aka no mu ade ketewaa bi na ɛde si data ahyehyɛde foforo no beae kɛse

Translated Question: Nsonsonoe titiriw bɛn na ɛda nkyerɛwde ahorow a wɔkenkan kɔ variable a ɛyɛ type string mu ne variable a ɛyɛ type char[] ntam?
Translated Desired Answer: Char[] no de null \0 nkyerɛwde bɛka ho wɔ ahama no awiei.
Translated Student Answer: Nkyerɛwde nhyehyɛe no wɔ nkyerɛwde a ɛwɔ nkyerɛwde awiei wɔ n’awiei.

Translated Question: Mfaso titiriw bɛn na ɛwɔ list a ɛwɔ nkitahodi abien so sen list a ɛwɔ nkitahodi titiriw?
Translated Desired Answer: Wobetumi ayɛ deletion ne insertion dwumadie nyinaa wɔ bere a ɛkɔ so daa mu, a saa dwumadie a wɔyɛ ansa na beaeɛ bi a wɔde ama wɔ list no mu anaa wɔ list no awieeɛ no ka ho.
Translated Student Answer: Mfomso titiriw a ɛwɔ list ahorow a ɛwɔ nkitahodi abien so ne sɛ (1) node biara hwehwɛ sɛ wonya pointer foforo, ɛhwehwɛ sɛ wonya baabi pii, na (2) node bi a wɔde bɛhyɛ mu anaasɛ wɔpopa no gye bere tenten kakra (pointer dwumadi pii).

Translated Question: Nsonsonoe titiriw bɛn na ɛda nhama a wɔde type string no abɔ ho dawuru ne nhama a wɔde nkyerɛwde nhyehyɛe a wɔde abɔ ho dawuru no ntam?
Translated Desired Answer: Nhama a wɔde nkyerɛwde nhyehyɛe a wɔde abɔ ho dawuru no wɔ null element a wɔde aka ho wɔ nhyehyɛe no awiei.
Translated Student Answer: Char array - Wobetumi de array subscript notation akɔ nkyerɛwde ankorankoro so tẽẽ. String array - array subscript bɛsan de ahama no nyinaa aba.

Translated Question: Nsonsonoe titiriw bɛn na ɛda nkyerɛwde ahorow a wɔkenkan kɔ variable a ɛyɛ type string mu ne variable a ɛyɛ type char[] ntam?
Translated Desired Answer: Char[] no de null \0 nkyerɛwde bɛka ho wɔ ahama no awiei.
Translated Student Answer: ahama yɛ nsakraeɛ a nkyerɛwdeɛ baako a wɔaka abom ayɛ no baako berɛ a ɛwɔ char[] mu no wɔama nkyerɛwdeɛ biara nkaeɛ boɔ na emu biara wɔ n’ankasa nsakraeɛ a wɔde ama i.e. char[0] char[1].

Translated Question: Kyerɛkyerɛ tiawa wɔ kasamu biako mu sɛnea merge sort yɛ adwuma?
Translated Desired Answer: Ɛkyekyɛ mfitiase nhyehyɛe no mu abien, hyehyɛ fã abien no mu biara, na afei ɛka nhyehyɛe a wɔahyehyɛ no bom.
Translated Student Answer: Merge sort fa array bi na ɛkyekyɛ mu mmienu na ɛde fã biara san kɔ ne ho recursively na ɛka bom na ɛhyehyɛ fã mmienu no berɛ a ɛfiri aseɛ san kɔ soro.

Translated Question: Ɔkwan bɛn so na compiler no di inline functions ho dwuma?
Translated Desired Answer: Ɛyɛ function code no bi wɔ beaeɛ biara a wɔyɛ function call.
Translated Student Answer: Compiler no betumi abu n’ani agu inline qualifier no so na mpɛn pii no ɔyɛ saa ma ne nyinaa gye dwumadi nketewa no.

Translated Question: Dɛn ne dua?
Translated Desired Answer: Node ahorow a wɔaboaboa ano, a ɛwɔ node soronko bi a wɔfrɛ no root, ne node a aka no, wɔakyekyɛ mu ayɛ no disjoint set biako anaa nea ɛboro saa, set biara yɛ dua.
Translated Student Answer: ntini ahorow a enni ano a ɛwɔ ntini ne asefo, na nea wɔde ka ho biara yɛ ahaban.

Translated Question: Dɛn ne nnyinasosɛm ma recursive implementation of merge sort?
Translated Desired Answer: Bere a array a wɔbɛhyehyɛ no kɛse yɛ 1 (anaa 2) .
Translated Student Answer: baabi a ɛsɛ sɛ woka sort pɛnkoro pɛ

Translated Question: Nsonsonoe titiriw bɛn na ɛda bere tiaa bi ne do...while asɛm bi ntam?
Translated Desired Answer: Block a ɛwɔ do...while statement mu no bɛyɛ adwuma anyɛ yiye koraa no pɛnkoro.
Translated Student Answer: While loop bɛhwɛ asɛm no mu ahwɛ sɛ ɛyɛ nokware ansa na woadi dwuma. Do while loop bi bɛyɛ adwuma ansa na woahwɛ asɛm no mu ahwɛ sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ ɛsan tu mmirika bio anaa.

Translated Question: Dɛn ne oprehyɛn dodow a wɔde yɛ insertion sort wɔ tebea a eye sen biara ase, na dɛn ne tebea a eye sen biara?
Translated Desired Answer: N (array no tenten) dwumadie a wɔtumi yɛ maa array a wɔahyehyɛ.
Translated Student Answer: Bere a wɔde tu mmirika ma saa nhyehyɛe a wɔde hyehyɛ nneɛma yi yɛ n^2. Best case ne sɛ wɔahyehyɛ list no dedaw, worst case ne sɛ wɔahyehyɛ list no nanso wɔ reverse.

Translated Question: Bere bɛn na C++ yɛ default constructor?
Translated Desired Answer: Sɛ wɔamfa constructor biara amma a, compiler no de bi ma default so. Sɛ wɔkyerɛkyerɛ constructor bi mu ma class bi a, compiler no nnyɛ default constructor.
Translated Student Answer: Sɛ wɔanhyehyɛ parameters biara a, ɛyɛ bere a wɔde default constructor di dwuma.

Translated Question: Anamɔn ahe na egye na woahwehwɛ node bi wɔ binary search tree mu?
Translated Desired Answer: Dua no sorokɔ.
Translated Student Answer: Anamɔn 3 a ɛboro so. Nsɛm 3 na ɛwɔ hɔ.

Translated Question: Dɛn na wɔtaa de ka adesuakuw nkyerɛase ho?
Translated Desired Answer: Data asɔremma (su ahorow) ne asɔremma dwumadi ahorow.
Translated Student Answer: Member dwumadie ne data asɔremma.

Translated Question: Dɛn ne stack?
Translated Desired Answer: Data nhyehyeɛ a ɛtumi sie elements, a ɛwɔ agyapadeɛ sɛ adeɛ a ɛtwa toɔ a wɔde aka ho no bɛyɛ deɛ ɛdi kan a wɔayi afiri hɔ (anaasɛ last-in-first-out) .
Translated Student Answer: data type a ɛkora nneɛma ahorow bi so wɔ nhyehyɛe pɔtee bi mu, last in, first out.

Translated Question: Nsonsonoe titiriw bɛn na ɛda bere tiaa bi ne do...while asɛm bi ntam?
Translated Desired Answer: Block a ɛwɔ do...while statement mu no bɛyɛ adwuma anyɛ yiye koraa no pɛnkoro.
Translated Student Answer: Loop a ɛwɔ do...while statement mu no yɛ adwuma pɛnkoro bere nyinaa.

Translated Question: Dɛn ne dua a wɔde hwehwɛ nneɛma abien?
Translated Desired Answer: Dua a ɛwɔ abien a ɛwɔ agyapade a ɛne sɛ wɔ node biara fam no, benkum abofra no sua sen ɔwofo a ɛno nso sua sen nifa abofra no.
Translated Student Answer: Binary dua a search key a ɛwɔ node n biara mu no sõ sen search key a ɛwɔ node biara a ɛwɔ n benkum subtree mu, nanso esua sen search key a ɛwɔ node biara a ɛwɔ n nifa subtree mu.

Translated Question: Dɛn ne stack dwumadie a ɛne enqueue dwumadie a ɛwɔ ntonto mu no hyia?
Translated Desired Answer: pia
Translated Student Answer: pia

Translated Question: Dɛn ne akwan horow abien a wɔfa so kyerɛ sɛnea nhyehyɛe bi tenten te?
Translated Desired Answer: Wɔ array mpaemuka no mu, anaasɛ denam initializer list a wode bedi dwuma so.
Translated Student Answer: Static na ɛyɛ nnam.

Translated Question: Ɔkwan bɛn so na wɔde arrays kɔ functions so?
Translated Desired Answer: denam nsɛm a wɔde gyina so so.
Translated Student Answer: Dwumadi no kenkan nsakrae ahorow no, sie. afei ɛsan de nea variable no kenkan biara no ba. Afei function no tintim array no mu nsɛm.

Translated Question: Dɛn ne dwumadi nsaano nkyerɛwee?
Translated Desired Answer: Dwumadie no din ne parameters a wɔahyehyɛ, a wɔn ahodoɔ ka ho.

Translated Question: Dɛn ne wiase nyinaa nsakrae ahorow no kɛse?

Translated Question: Dɛn ne ahaban?
Translated Desired Answer: Node a enni mma.

Translated Question: Dɛn ne dua a wɔde hwehwɛ nneɛma abien?
Translated Desired Answer: Dua a ɛwɔ mmienu a ɛwɔ agyapadeɛ sɛ wɔ node biara fam no, benkum abofra no sua sene ɔwofoɔ a ɛno nso sua sene abofra nifa.

Safoa a ɛwɔ benkum dua ketewa a ɛnyɛ hwee (nifa so dua ketewa) mu no sua (kɛse) sen safe a ɛwɔ dua ketewa no ntini mu. values a ɛwɔ node nyinaa mu wɔ benkum subtree a ɛwɔ node bi mu no sua sen node value no values a ɛwɔ node nyinaa mu wɔ node bi nifa subtree mu no sõ sen node values

Translated Question: Ɛhe na wɔbɔ nsakrae ahorow ho dawuru wɔ C++ nhyehyɛe mu?
Translated Desired Answer: Wobetumi abɔ nsakrae ahorow ho dawuru wɔ baabiara wɔ dwumadi bi mu. Wobetumi abɔ wɔn amanneɛ wɔ dwumadie bi mu (local variables) anaasɛ wɔ functions no akyi (global variables) .
Translated Student Answer: wɔ dwumadie no mu ne dwumadie no akyi wɔ wiase nyinaa nsakraeɛ ho

Translated Question: Dɛn ne list a ɛwɔ nkitahodi?
Translated Desired Answer: Nneɛma a wɔaboaboa ano a wobetumi akyekyɛ wɔ ɔkwan a ɛyɛ nnam so.
Translated Student Answer: Linked list yɛ nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn a ɛwɔ structs anaa records a wɔfrɛ no nodes. Anyɛ yiye koraa no, node biara wɔ emufo abien, na emu biako twe adwene si ade anaa node a edi hɔ a ɛwɔ list no mu so.

Translated Desired Answer: Wobetumi ayɛ deletion ne insertion dwumadie nyinaa wɔ bere a ɛkɔ so daa mu, a saa dwumadie a wɔyɛ ansa na beaeɛ bi a wɔde ama wɔ list no mu anaa wɔ list no awieeɛ no ka ho.

Translated Question: Nsonsonoe bɛn na ɛwɔ constructor ne function ntam?
Translated Desired Answer: Wɔfrɛ constructor bere biara a wɔbɛbɔ ade bi, bere a ɛsɛ sɛ wɔfrɛ function bi pefee. Constructors nni return type, nanso ɛsɛ sɛ functions kyerɛ return type.
Translated Student Answer: constructor bɔ class adeɛ no kɔ memory mu baabi a functions yɛ nneyɛeɛ tia saa adeɛ no

Translated Question: Oprehyɛn bɛn na ebehia sɛ woyɛ na ama woahu element bi a wɔde ama wo wɔ stack bi so?
Translated Desired Answer: Pop elements no nyinaa na sie wɔ stack foforo so kosi sɛ wobehu element no, afei pia elements a ɛwɔ mfitiase stack no so nyinaa san kɔ akyi.
Translated Student Answer: Popa ade biara fi soro kosi sɛ wubehu nea worehwehwɛ no. Sɛ stack no ba awiei a hwee nni mu na woanhu ade no da a, ɛnde enni stack no mu. Ebia ɛho behia nso sɛ wode popped values no sie sɛ ebia wopɛ sɛ wosan yɛ stack no a.

Translated Question: Dɛn ne stack?
Translated Desired Answer: Data nhyehyeɛ a ɛtumi sie elements, a ɛwɔ agyapadeɛ sɛ adeɛ a ɛtwa toɔ a wɔde aka ho no bɛyɛ deɛ ɛdi kan a wɔayi afiri hɔ (anaasɛ last-in-first-out) .
Translated Student Answer: Stack te sɛ array, nanso ɛmma kwan mma wɔmfa random access. Stacks ma ɔdefoɔ kwan ma ɔgye adeɛ a ɛtwa toɔ a wɔde ahyɛ stack no mu no nko ara. Nea etwa to wɔ mu, fist out.

Translated Question: Mfaso titiriw bɛn na ɛwɔ linked lists so sen arrays?

Translated Student Answer: Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ ne kɛse a enni ano, anohyeto nkutoo ne system memory ne tumi a ɛsan trɛw kɛse no mu dynamically.

Translated Question: Dɛn ne list a ɛwɔ nkitahodi?

Translated Question: Nsonsonoe bɛn na ɛwɔ array a wɔapae mu aka sɛ ɛyɛ static, ne nea ɛnte saa ntam?
Translated Desired Answer: Array ahorow a wɔapae mu aka sɛ ɛyɛ static no tra ase wɔ dwumadi no nkwa nna nyinaa mu; kyerɛ sɛ, wɔhyɛ aseɛ pɛnkoro pɛ, berɛ a wɔdi kan frɛ dwumadie a ɛbɔ array no ho amanneɛ no.

Translated Question: Mfaso titiriw bɛn na ɛwɔ arrays so sen linked lists?
Translated Desired Answer: Wobetumi akɔ elements a ɛwɔ array mu no tẽẽ (a ɛne linked lists bɔ abira, a ɛhwehwɛ sɛ wɔsan twa mu bio).
Translated Student Answer: Linked list wɔ nkɔanim a ɛyɛ den wɔ dwumadie no mu. Linked list no wɔ array a ɛkɔ so nyin a ɛma memory kɔ soro.

Translated Question: Mfaso titiriw bɛn na ɛwɔ linked lists so sen arrays?

Translated Question: Wɔ kasamu biako mu no, adwene titiriw bɛn na wɔde di dwuma denam insertion sort so?
Translated Desired Answer: Sɛ ɛfa array element biako bere koro mu, fi benkum kɔ nifa a, ɛde hyɛ nifa gyinabea wɔ element ahorow a wɔahyehyɛ dedaw wɔ ne benkum so no mu.

Translated Question: Kyerɛkyerɛ tiawa wɔ kasamu biako mu sɛnea merge sort yɛ adwuma?

Translated Question: Nsonsonoe bɛn na ɛda data member ne local variable a ɛwɔ member function mu ntam?
Translated Desired Answer: Wobetumi anya data asɔremma afi asɔremma dwumadie biara a ɛwɔ adesua nkyerɛaseɛ no mu. Local variables no betumi akɔ mu nkutoo wɔ member function a ɛkyerɛkyerɛ mu no mu.
Translated Student Answer: data member no yɛ nea dwumadie nyinaa tumi kɔ mu wɔ adesua no mu, baabi a local variable no wɔ hɔ ma member dwumadie no nko ara na ɛboɔ yera berɛ a dwumadie no ato mu

Translated Question: Ntotoho ahe na egye na woahu element bi wɔ binary search tree mu?
